Product Features

Transitional bomber jacket with the AGH letters embroidered thereon. The neck, sleeves, and bottom part of the jacket are ribbed. Press stud fastening alongside the entire jacket, side pockets. Available in two colour versions: black and pewter and navy-blue and grey.
The jacket is a unisex style – our female clients are advised to choose a size smaller than usual if they want to avoid the oversize effect. 

Opis produktu
size: XS to XXL (unisex) 
model: press-stud jacket 
colour: black and pewter and navy-blue and grey
embroidery colour: red and white 
material: 80% cotton, 20% polyester
weight: 300 g/m²
